event: admitted to the intensive burn care unit
irrigation with water not performed at scene
irrigation with water started after arrival in burn center
sodium bicarbonate administration 300 mmol over 14 hours
lactate from Hartmann's solution 140 mmol over 24 hours
moderate alteration of left ventricular function
maintained urine output during first week
continuous venovenous hemofiltration started after first week
left intensive care unit after 5 months
